channel.title: Projects on Leo Generali
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Leo Generali

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Metro Map

HTML, CSS, Knockout.js

Single page, responsive DC Metro map application. Users can either query through all stations through a search bar, or click on the data points to receive incoming transit information. AJAX requests are used to pull information from WMATA and District of Columbia Open Data APIs.

Link Github

Guess the Color!

HTML, Skeleton, JavaScript

Quickly find information about your favorite films and settle all those barroom bets with your friends. AJAX requests are used to obtain data courtesy of the Open Movie Database.

Link Github

Simon Says

HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Test your memory by playing a digital version of the children's classic, Simon. Start it up and see how far you can make it before the game gets tough for you! Uses Flexbox for object positioning.

Link Github

Bee Movie Ipsum Generator

HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Coded a placeholder text generator using vanilla JavaScript and a custom MVC developmental framework to organize the code. The program automatically generates a number of sentences or paragraphs based on user inputs. Uses bespoke, hand-picked Bee Movie quotes to provide new Jerry Seinfeld-flavored filler texts for your projects anytime.

Link Github

Guess the Color!

HTML, Skeleton, JavaScript

Players are given a random RGB value and must guess which of the squares is that color. A variable score is added to the player's point total depending on how many attempts the player took to find the right color. The game is won once the player reaches 300 points. DOM manipulation is handled through vanilla Javascript.

Link Github
